title: Satellites reveal heat leaking from largest US cryptocurrency mining center
description: Bitcoin-mining mega data center seen leaking heat into the environment in an image captured from orbit by a thermometer satellite
content: Bitcoin-mining mega data center seen leaking heat into the environment in an image captured from orbit by a thermometer satellite
